name: NecktiePro
0:
”Alexa, open necktie pro.”
”How do I tie a Windsor Knot?”
”Teach me to tie a Pratt Knot.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: necktie pro
des: Easily tie a tie with step-by-step instructions from any Alexa enabled device. This skill offers instructions for Windsor, Half Windsor, Four-in-hand, and Pratt knots. Simply ask Alexa how to tie the knot of your choice and you will be looking great in no time!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
